synopsis.text:
He ading into the heart of a sprawling metropolis, a young man named Kou embarks on a quest to locate his estranged older brother, Takumi. Upon discovering Takumi's whereabouts in a gritty, downtrodden neighborhood, Kou is surprised to learn that his brother has taken the reins of a private detective agency, the Mikuni Detective Agency.

Determined to bring Takumi back home, Kou soon realizes that his brother has no intention of returning to their old life. Instead, Takumi enlists his younger sibling's help in managing the peculiar tasks and eccentric clientele that the agency attracts. With Takumi's flamboyant demeanor and occasional disregard for modesty, the brothers' newfound bond leads them on a series of thrilling and unpredictable adventures.

As Kou delves deeper into the world of private investigation, he finds himself embracing his new role within the agency. Alongside Takumi and his fearless team of detectives, Kou encounters a diverse array of enigmatic individuals, each with their own extraordinary stories to tell. With every new case, Kou's life becomes increasingly intertwined with the captivating world of mystery and intrigue that his brother has come to call home.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
